posts.body:
op here, i think i found a way.
in the zeronet main page, click the three dots on the left, and go to plugins. look for the multiuser plugin and enable it.
after that, a new "user" section should come up on the main page, next to the tor and port statuses. to change your id, simply click that new "user" section and click logout, then refresh, and you should now be on a new identity.
